long_description: The reliable and roomy Marmot Stormlight 2P Tent provides great 3-season protection from the weather. It's perfect for backpacking in the Rockies, trekking in Nepal or camping at Lake Tahoe. Industry-leading DAC Pressfit 9mm poles create a strong, freestanding frame; color-coded poles and clip webbings make it easy to set up the tent. Polyurethane-coated, solution-dyed polyester rainfly resists UV degradation; sonic seam-welds increase waterproofness and durability. Catenary cut, bathtub-style nylon floor with taped seams is coated with polyurethane for durable, waterproof performance. Inverted head and foot technology maximizes livable space; interior pockets keep small items organized. 2 big D-shaped doors with 2 vestibules offer easy access and dry space for gear. Pitch the poles, rainfly and footprint without the canopy to create an ultralight rain shelter (footprint sold separately). The Marmot Stormlight 2P Tent features reinforced intersection welds, jingle-free nylon zipper pulls and light-reflective points.
short_description: The reliable and roomy Marmot Stormlight 2P Tent provides great 3-season protection from the weather. It's perfect for backpacking in the Rockies, trekking in Nepal or camping at Lake Tahoe.
